name: market for concrete, 37MPa | concrete, 37MPa | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/13564/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'concrete, for de-icing salt contact', in the geography of Switzerland.;Local market data set for Swiss conditions based on the local production of ready-mixed concrete;The transport distances in this market are taken from a model based on statistics on transport of goods in Switzerland (Valsasina, 2016, Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent, www.ecoinvent.org).

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'concrete, for de-icing salt contact',  within the geography of Switzerland.

This activity ends with the supply of 'concrete, for de-icing salt contact',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Assumed transport distance of 50 km based on expert judgement for CH, considering the local production of ready-mixed concrete

exchanges.description: The transport distances in this market are taken from a model based on statistics on transport of goods in Switzerland (Valsasina, 2016, Default transport data per commodity group for Switzerland, ecoinvent, www.ecoinvent.org). The value is then multiplied for the density of the product, which is specified in the exchange properties.
